mode.description: Button mode. icon: indicates that there is only an icon, and mixture: indicates that the icon text is combined
mode.description_zh: 按钮模式。icon：表示仅有图标；mixture：表示图标文字结合

iconType.description: Icon type. hand: for hand, heart: for heart
iconType.description_zh: 图标类型。hand：表示手形；heart：表示心形

likeText.description: Copy on the Like button. Defaults to Like, which is only valid if the mode property value is 'mixture'
likeText.description_zh: 点赞按钮上的文案。默认为赞，仅在 mode 属性值为'mixture'时有效

likeType.description: The type of object that was liked. 0: Likes the content of the article, and 1: Likes the content of the comment
likeType.description_zh: 被点赞的对象类型。0：表示对文章内容进行点赞；1：表示对评论内容进行点赞

animationType.description: Like the animated form. 0: No dynamic effect, 1: Light kinetic effect, 2: Strong dynamic effect
animationType.description_zh: 点赞动效形式。0：无动效；1：轻动效；2：强动效

isShowToast.description: Whether a toast prompt pops up after liking
isShowToast.description_zh: 点赞后是否弹出 toast 提示

toastText.description: Toast copy, defaulted to Liked, Canceled
toastText.description_zh: toast 文案，默认为已点赞、已取消

likeParam.description: The necessary parameters required for the like service
likeParam.description_zh: 点赞服务需要的必要参数

onError.description: This event is triggered when the user is not logged in when the button is clicked when the likes component is ingested using the npm method, and when the likes component is ingested using the dynamic library method, this event is not triggered when the user is not logged in when the button is clicked
onError.description_zh: 使用 npm 方式引入点赞组件时，点击按钮时在用户未登录状态下会触发此事件；使用动态库方式引入点赞组件时，点击按钮时在用户未登录状态下不会触发此事件

onSuccess.description: Click the Like button to return the status to the user of the component after the like service is successful
onSuccess.description_zh: 点击点赞按钮，在点赞服务成功后将状态返回给使用组件者

onFail.description: Click the Like button to return the status to the user of the component after the like service fails
onFail.description_zh: 点击点赞按钮，在点赞服务失败后将状态返回给使用组件者
